import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { GlobalService } from 'src/app/services/glopal.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-posts', templateUrl: './posts.component.html', styleUrls: ['./posts.component.css'], }) export class PostsComponent implements OnInit { posts: any; constructor(private global: GlobalService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.global.getPosts().subscribe((data) => { this.posts = data; }); } }
